links: Index entries for sequences related to final digits of numbers
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,-1,1).
mathematica: Table[PowerMod[8, n, 10], {n, 0, 200}] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jun 10 2011 *)
prog: (Sage) [power_mod(8,n,10)for n in xrange(0,105)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 27 2009](MAGMA) [8^n mod 10: n in [0..150]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Apr 12 2011(PARI) a(n)=lift(Mod(8,10)^n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Dec 29 2012
